Sleigh_init_code:
MOV DWORD ECX, [ESP + 4]
MOV DWORD [EAX + 24], ECX
MOV DWORD [EAX + 16], 5
MOV DWORD [EAX + 20], 9

Reindeer_init_code:
MOV DWORD ECX, [ESP + 4]
MOV DWORD [EAX + 16], ECX

Shop_init_code:
MOV DWORD ECX, [ESP + 4]
MOV DWORD [EAX + 24], ECX
MOV DWORD [EAX + 16], 8

Elf_init_code:
MOV DWORD ECX, [ESP + 4]
MOV DWORD [EAX + 16], ECX
